symptoms.name: Slapped cheek rash
symptoms.pattern: Bright red rash on cheeks, followed by lacy rash on body

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: Present in some cases, usually precedes rash

symptoms.name: Cold-like symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Runny nose, stuffy nose, fatigue, body aches, headache

symptoms.name: Joint pain and swelling
symptoms.severity: Mild to moderate, more common in adults
symptoms.pattern: Affects hands, wrists, knees; can last weeks to months

symptoms.name: Itchy rash
symptoms.pattern: Can be present, especially in children

symptoms.name: Anemia
symptoms.pattern: Pale skin, dizziness, drowsiness, rapid breathing, rapid pulse

physical_findings: Lacy, reticulated rash on trunk and extremities

lab_values.Complete blood count (CBC): May show anemia in severe cases

risk_factors: Individuals with blood disorders (sickle cell anemia, hemolytic anemia)

diagnostic_criteria.supportive: Positive serology for parvovirus B19, cold-like symptoms, joint pain
